components.name: blog_teaser

fields.description: The date of the blog post

fields.description: The preview image for the blog post

fields.description: URL and label for the blog post linked

fields.description: The blog entry URL to link

fields.description: The label to use for the link

fields.name: readingTime
fields.description: Time to read for the blog post

fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.description: The author of the blog post

fields.name: image
fields.description: The image URL of the author
